Trade/Device Name(s): GluNEO Lite Professional Glucose Monitoring System
Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GluNEO Lite and GluNEO Lite Professional Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood from multiple body sites (and venous whole blood for Professional version) as an aid for diabetes control; home use (single patient) and professional healthcare settings (multiple patients), not for diagnosis or neonatal use
